title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historic Site: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park         Archaeological dig at Fallen Timbers. COURTESY Metroparks of the Toledo Area  Volunteer  Metroparks of the Toledo Area offers wide range of volunteer opportunities. Historical volunteers assist in programming, archaeological surveys and maintenance of historical sites. For information on volunteer opportunities at Metroparks, call 419-407-9700. The historical site includes the Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fallen Timbers Monument, on opposites sides of US 24, as well as Fort Miamis on River Road.
